p: Both Wasita essential oil (WEO) and Safsaf essential oil (SEO) were obtained in yellow color with a strong aromatic odor. During fall 2017, WEO had a significantly higher yield and specific gravity (1.6 ± 0.03%v/w, 0.9 ± 0.04, respectively, p < 0.01, paired -t-test) than SEO (1.4 ± 0.02%v/w and 0.6 ± 0.02, respectively). No significant difference in the results was observed during fall 2018 than those obtained during fall 2017 (Table 1).
